author: Nick Romano
title: Samuel L. Jackson reads Stay the F**k at Home coronavirus book on Jimmy Kimmel
description: Stay the F--- at Home: Samuel L. Jackson has a new book to read on Kimmel
content:
Samuel L. Jackson has a message for everyone about the coronavirus pandemic, and he read it aloud on Jimmy Kimmel Live this week in the form of your new favorite children's bedtime story.
It's called Stay the F--- at Home and it teaches people to stay the f—… [+864 chars]
